choices.D: It adds a new device configuration.
choices.B: It deletes all the device configurations.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A developer needs to write a Python script to automate a task using a NETCONF query. What does the query do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
deletes some device configurations.

questions.question_text: A network engineer makes several API calls to Cisco Prime to retrieve a list of all devices. Each time a response is received, only a subset of the devices is returned. The engineer notices that HTTP code 429 is returned instead of 200 for some API calls. Why did the response exclude some of the devices?

choices.C: The API timed out the request.
choices.B: The API failed to identify how many items to retrieve.
choices.A: The API applied an offset that was indicated in the request.
choices.D: The API rate limited the request.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
HTTP code 429 means that too many requests were sent. D is the answer.

choices.C: and a username-password combination to request command
choices.B: add the authorization header with the access token

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
To send local file attachments, simply post a message by including your access token in the Authorization header

curl --request POST \
 --header "Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN" \
 --form "files=@/home/desktop/example.png;type=image/png" \
 --form "roomId=Y2lzY2....." \
 --form "text=example attached" \
 https://webexapis.com/v1/messages

Selected Answer: B
Should be B because the others dont make sense
I think Authorization Header is needed as it stated in the documentation. But what about the content-type request header? Isn't it should be 'multipart/form-data'?

comments.content: I think that's also something you need, but not a possible answer. All other answers don't make sense, so process of elimination.

--header "Content-Type: application/json" \
Is needed when you send Remote Attachments not for Local File Attachments.

B is Correct

You can find this information on:
https://developer.webex.com/docs/api/basics

questions.question_text: An engineer must investigate the problems on a web application and address them to related teams. The engineer verifies the application reachability from the single public IP address with port and discovers that HTTPS access works to three servers of a network farm with IP 172.16.50.1 .2 and .4, but HTTPS access to the server with IP 172.16.50.3 does not work. Which problem type must be addressed as the cause for the case?

discussion.content: B , There is a NAT issue; the port is accessible from other units.

Selected Answer: B
It's a NAT issue, right?

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

Drag and drop the Python data transformation methods from the left onto the data formats on the right.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
JSON
Lists become Lists because JSON directly represents Python lists as arrays
Objects convert to Dictionaries because JSON stores Python dictionaries as objects

YAML
Arrays convert to Lists because YAML transforms arrays into a list structure which Python interprets as a list
Objects become Dictionaries because YAML stores objects in a key-value structure which Python interprets as a dictionary

JSON:
 Arrays convert to Lists.
 Objects become Dictionaries.
 YAML:
 Lists become Lists.
 Objects convert to Dictionaries.

JSON:
Lists become Lists.
Objects convert to Dictionaries.
YAML:
Arrays convert to Lists.
Objects become Dictionaries.
